hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: A man came to the Prophet (ﷺ), and said: My wife does not prevent the hand of a man who touches her. He said: Divorce her. He then said: I am afraid my inner self may covet her. He said: Then enjoy her

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ تَزْوِيجِ، مِنْ لَمْ يَلِدْ مِنَ النِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Marrying Women Who Do Not Give Birth
